name: VideoRemoteStateReason
description: The reason for the remote video state change.

parameters.Internal: 0: The SDK reports this reason when the video state changes.

parameters.LocalMuted:
3: The local user stops receiving the remote
  video stream or disables the video module.

parameters.LocalUnmuted: 4: The local user resumes receiving the remote video stream or enables the video module.

parameters.RemoteMuted: 5: The remote user stops sending the video stream or disables the video module.

parameters.RemoteUnmuted: 6: The remote user resumes sending the video stream or enables the video module.

parameters.RemoteOffline: 7: The remote user leaves the channel.

parameters.AudioFallback: 8: The remote audio-and-video stream falls back to the audio-only stream due to poor network conditions.

parameters.AudioFallbackRecovery: 9: The remote audio-only stream switches back to the audio-and-video stream after the network conditions improve.
